channel.title: golang on Luu Nguyen Phat
channel.description: Recent content in golang on Luu Nguyen Phat

item.title: [Basic - 00] Setting up GOROOT, GOPATH
item.description: Open ~/.bashrc file with vim to edit: vim ~/.bashrc Add following lines export GOROOT=/usr/local/go export PATH=$PATH:$GOROOT/bin # Wherever, up to you export GOPATH=/root/codekeeper/go export PATH=$PATH:$GOPATH/bin

item.title: [Basic - 02] Create a Go module
item.description: See details here In this tutorial you’ll create two modules: The first is a library which is intended to be imported by other libraries or applications. The second is a caller application which will use the first. This tutorial’s sequence includes six brief topics that each illustrate a different part of the language. Create a module – Write a small module with functions you can call from another module.

item.title: [Basic - 01] Get started with Go
item.description: See details at: here Go Package là tập hợp các file trong cùng một thư mục, hướng tới xử lí một tập hợp các vấn đề có liên quan đến thứ mà Package đó hướng tới, ví dụ, trong thư mục user của mình mình có 3 file .go cùng xử lí các vấn đề liên quan đối với user thì mình sẽ đặt tên package là user, việc này giúp năng cao khả năng tái sử dụng code cho những project sau này.

item.title: 01 Captain Code
item.description: var ( x int y int z int ) var t int = 8 Number: uninitialized value in Go equals to 0 package main import "fmt" func main() { var x int x = 1 var y int = 1 // inferred var z = 4.5 // var t int // t = 8 t := 8 // popular // convert type t = int(z) t = float64(x) c := complex(4,3) } s := "CaptainCode" fmt.

item.title: GOPATH Explained
item.description: See details at: https://flaviocopes.com/go-gopath/ Go programmers typically keep all their Go code in a single workspace. A workspace contains many version control repositories (managed by Git, for example). Each repository contains one or more packages. Libraries installed using go get will be put in $GOPATH/src Commands installed using go get will be put in $GOPATH/bin

item.title: 00 Captain Code Golang
item.description: Nhung cai duoc Go tai ve se duoc luu tai src go get github.com/letung3105/demo Neu package Go module Go run chay code Go build Go install -> build file & bo vo folder bin
